lead_paragraph: But the investment company reported a small increase in assets under management at time when most big asset managers had withdrawals.

headline.print_headline: Income Dives 70% for Blackstone, but Assets Keep Climbing

snippet: But the investment company reported a small increase in assets under management at time when most big asset managers had withdrawals.
abstract: Blackstone Group reports fourth-quarter profit of $435 million, down 70 percent from $1.4 billion in year-ago quarter; reports 2015 profit of $2.1 billion, down 51 percent from $4.3 billion in 2014.
